goals__remit:
The aim of this association is to facilitate and encourage the industrial and commercial 
activities of its members. 
Its objectives are therefore to: 
 
a - develop and promote the activities of its members 
 
b- promote and uphold the interests of its members especially within the European Institutions 
 
c - foster interchanges between the members so as to promote trade and the exchange of information and so as to encourage them to give one another mutual support in the course of their transactions or activities.
